body_html: Autograd support for sparse matrices is essential for working in highly sparse and computationally costly learning domains such as when dealing with 2D and 3D point clouds (ie 2D and 3D conv nets operating on sparse data), among other important applications. Support for it will be extremely useful, and critical in choice of deep learning framework for these applications. I would like to add my voice of support to the other requests for this capability as well.
